name: lüp blaster
description:
Mouse recommended! -> left click to shoot

Use your mouse based mastery to vanquish loops in all their forms, in lüp blaster! an arcade experience forged in 72 hours for ludum dare 47 to the theme Stuck in a loop.

3 distinct levels with a pounding soundtrack and vibrant visuals. 
Earn credits as you play to unlock new weapons, abilities and upgrades.

Every loop has a weakspot, gun them down against increasingly desperate odds as the loops become faster and become harder and harder to hit.
